entry.title: Sunday: A few showers. High 17.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers this afternoon with risk of thunderstorms. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Rain showers changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers near noon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 08 May 2016
